"...This is the universe before its creation. Before any records exist, a realm of nothingness. A location with nothing to destroy."
"The desire to eradicate all will dissipate and vanish here, along with you."
"And so, the universe will begin."
"The light that arrived before the universe began. The single light that vanished at its beginning. From that, the Akashic Record will be born."
"You were here from the beginning. As one aware of all of that would come to be."
"All things begin here... and end here."
"If this will save everyone..."
"...If only I could have seen our future."
"A Great Light lies within, and will shine forth from here."
"...With this, the universe will begin. Gaze upon the light of creation."
"That is the light of the Akashic Record. From it is spun the neverending thread of history. It is the form of the world you created."
"And so, history begins... History repeats from here."
"...However."
"However."
"Even were we to lose the history stretching from past to present..."
"...The future must not lose you."

"<%me>.
Can't you hear them? The voices of everyone are calling out to you."

"<%me>.
Can't you see them? They are within arm's reach."
"If you remain the vessel of this world, this history will repeat itself."
"But a connection beyond the world will weave a new future."
"Open your eyes. Connect to the memories, and walk towards the future."

"<%me>.
The original existence, and the final ARKS."
"The answers to all come from within the history you wove."
"I am grateful that I was able to meet with you."

"Progress from the previous session was saved.
Would you like to continue?

Saved progress will not be erased if 'From the beginning' is selected."
"Continue"
"From the beginning"
